id.description: Original source identifier for the artwork (e.g. museum object ID).

source.description: Institution or collection shorthand (e.g. met, cma, smithsonian).

date.description: Artwork date or period as supplied by the source institution.

license.description: License statement confirming open access use.

image.description: Relative path within the package to the optimized wallpaper image.

attribution.description: Optional human-readable attribution or credit line.

notes.description: Optional curation notes, processing details, or caveats.
